text: Excited to announce that Troutman Pepper Partners Callan G. Stein, Michael S. Lowe, and Associate Christopher M. Brolley will be presenting at the Higher Education & Healthcare Research Compliance Conference 2024! Join us on June 11th in New Orleans as we delve into "101 - Name, Image, and Likeness (NIL) in College Athletics: Current Rules for Educational Institutions and What Is Likely to Come Next." Let's foster constructive dialogue about this complex issue!
